contextId.information: This is one part out of five equal parts. (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:translate_fraction]])

This means the person must return what he owes to someone and pay an extra one-fifth of the value. See how you translated this in [[:en:bible:notes:lev:05:14|5:16]]. (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:translate_fraction]])
This is one part of ten equal parts. (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:translate_fraction]])
This is one part out of five equal parts. (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:translate_fraction]])

A "fifth" is a part of something that is divided into five equal parts. AT: "he must divide the value of the house into five equal parts, add the amount equal to one of those parts, and pay all of it" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:translate_fraction]])
contextId.quote: he must add a fifth of its value to its redemption price
